languages.text: "Все просто. Нужно отрубить руку почтенной техножрицы и использовать ее для общения с машинным духом".

traits.locale_text: "Все просто. Нужно отрубить руку почтенной техножрицы и использовать ее для общения с машинным духом".

languages.text: "Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."
languages.original_text: "Все просто. Нужно отрубить руку почтенной техножрицы и использовать ее для общения с машинным духом".

traits.locale_text: "Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."
"Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."
"Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the Just-Logicarius's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."
"Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the Just-Logicarius's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."
"Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."
"Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."

languages.text: « Qu'à cela ne tienne. Nous n'avons qu'à trancher la main de l'honorable technoprêtresse avant de nous en servir pour communier avec l'esprit de la machine. »
languages.original_text: "Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'à cela ne tienne. Nous n'avons qu'à trancher la main de la juste-logicarius avant de nous en servir pour communier avec l'esprit de la machine. »

languages.text: «Bueno, en ese caso la solución es sencilla: cortamos la mano de la estimada tecnosacerdotisa y la usamos para entrar en comunión con el espíritu máquina».
languages.original_text: "Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, en ese caso la solución es sencilla: cortamos la mano de la Justi-Logicarius y la usamos para entrar en comunión con el espíritu máquina».

languages.text: “既然如此，这个问题很容易解决。只要把这位尊敬的技术神甫的手砍掉，用它和机魂进行交流就好了。”
languages.original_text: "Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，这个问题很容易解决。只要把这个裁决逻辑士的手砍掉，用它和机魂进行交流就好了。”

languages.text: 「ならば、解決策は簡単だ。高名なる技術司祭の手を切り落とし、機械精霊との交渉に使う」
languages.original_text: "Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."

traits.locale_text: 「ならば、解決策は簡単だ。ジャスト・ロジカリウスの手を切り落とし、機械精霊との交渉に使う」

languages.text: "Nun, dann ist die Lösung recht simpel. Wir schneiden der verehrten Techpriesterin die Hand ab und nutzen sie, um mit dem Maschinengeist Zwiesprache zu halten."
languages.original_text: "Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, dann ist die Lösung recht simpel. Wir schneiden der Just-Logicarius die Hand ab und nutzen sie, um mit dem Maschinengeist Zwiesprache zu halten."

languages.text: "O hâlde çözüm gayet basit. Muhterem Tekno Rahip'in elini kesip makine ruhuyla iletişime geçmek için kullanacağız."
languages.original_text: "Well, then the solution is quite simple. We cut off the esteemed Tech-Priest's hand and use it to commune with the machine spirit."
